briefTitle: Blood Pressure Lowering Ability and Safety of an Olmesartan and Amlodipine Based Treatment Regimen in Patients With Stage I and Stage II Hypertension
officialTitle: A Prospective, Open-label Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of an Olmesartan and Amlodipine Based Treatment Regimen in Subjects With Stage 1 and Stage 2 Hypertension
summary: This study will be conducted to assess the efficacy and safety of an amlodipine/olmesartan treatment regimen in stage 1 and stage 2 hypertensive subjects.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Mean 24-hour Systolic Blood Pressure Measured by Ambulatory Monitoring
